about_the_game:
TACO TERROR asks the boldest questions about the tastiest of threats as a glorious boomer shooter with hilarious writing and vibrant 2D art, all set against a capitalism-gone-insane cyberpunk future. Prepare for upgrades, prepare for choices, prepare to brutalize the enemies that have taken everything from you! Oh, and you should probably prepare to be hunted by an entire, globe-spanning corporation. No pressure...

Story Time!


You are Esteban Gonzalez - son to the renown Palo Gonzalez, who ushered in a technological golden age with his unbelievably-specific A.I. creation G.R.E.T.A.I. This metal brain took control of vital industries such as fast food, old electronic recycling, a single government computer with a sign next to it that reads "DON'T TOUCH EVER!!!", and all butterfly lifecycle programs. The Technical Artisanal Culture Organization (or T.A.C.O. for short) took control of G.R.E.T.A.I. after killing Palo, and they've let the A.I. run absolutely wild.

Feature Time!


- Over 15 levels of food-fighting so good you won't have any leftovers.
- 10+ upgrades to super-size the pain being dished.
- Mini games, old-timey phone dialing, and cooking - finally all in one place!
- Ultimate attacks to squash enemies into food paste.
- Four walls and a roof!
- Dozens of hilariously written ads, phone calls, and Boomer angst to keep you chuckling.
- Amazing comedic contributions by the team at AgonyWolf Media and Robot Co-op.

Run, gun, choke, dive, jump, love(?), and slide your way through the forces of T.A.C.O. Take back New TACO City from these forces of fried evil.

Join the fight against the food that fights back!

Birth Of A TACO Hero - A Taco Terror Story

name: Taco Terror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 520
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • VR Support: N/A

short_description: TACO TERROR is a boomer shooter set in a cyberpunk future where capitalism rules everyone - except for you. Run, gun, choke, dive, jump, love(?), and slide your way through the forces of T.A.C.O. Take back New TACO City from these forces of fried evil before you become too... delicious.
